name: Jackal (1986)
description: Jackal (特殊部隊ジャッカル, Tokushu Butai Jakkaru, "Special Forces Jackal"), also distributed under the title of Top Gunner, is an overhead run'n gun-style shoot-'em-up video game by Konami released for the arcades in 1986. The player must maneuver an armed jeep in order to rescue prisoners of war (POWs) trapped in enemy territory.
